newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian Brantano says Brussels IPO to float 40 pct.
newsitem.headline: Belgian Brantano says Brussels IPO to float 40 pct.

text.p: Belgian shoe distributor Brantano NV said at a news conference on Wednesday it would float 40 percent of its stock at next month's planned initial public offering on the Brussels bourse.
Chief executive officer Joris Brantegem said the IPO would not take the form of a capital increase.
He said a prospectus and details of the listing would be presented at a road show on May 28.
Bookbuilding for institutional investors would start on May 29. The book building period would be followed by a public offering.
The IPO is being managed by brokerages KB Securities and Petercam.
